template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Non-Profit Management package!

This set of applications is built for NGOs of all sizes; whether you're supporting local communities, protecting the environment, or advocating for human rights. Odoo helps you manage everything in one place: donations, petitions, volunteers, events, memberships, and communication.
With connected tools like Donations, CRM, Events, Website, and Planning, you can save time on admin work and focus more on your mission.
Let Odoo handle the logistics, so you can focus on making a difference. üåç

ul.li: Donations records contributions and generates fiscal attestations for donors.
Petition tracks signatures, signatories, and progress for each petition.
Project structures campaigns, assigns tasks, and tracks progress.
Donors, members, signatories, and partners are organized in Contacts .
Follow-ups and communication logs are handled efficiently with CRM .
Create events to raise awareness, coordinate volunteer activities, or host annual general assemblies.
Promote events, create donation and petition forms, and sell merchandise online using Website & eCommerce .
Recurring memberships and automated renewals are managed by Subscription .
Volunteer shifts and roles are scheduled and tracked through Planning .
Thank-you notes for donors, petition follow-ups, and newsletters are sent using Email Marketing .

template.p: Donations records contributions from supporters, including donor details, and easily generates fiscal attestations for tax purposes.

ol.li: Use the Website app to create a donation form that collects key donor information and preferred amounts.
Once submitted and paid, the donation appears in the Donations app with full donor and payment details.
Generate fiscal attestations in the Donations app by selecting the relevant year and defining the minimum donation amount required for eligibility.
Export fiscal attestations list as a CSV file for authorities, including donor names, total donations amount, and transaction dates.
Send PDFs of fiscal attestations to donors via email as proof of their contributions.

ul.li: Add custom fields using the website editor to collect the info needed from donors.
Use the Sign app to upload your fiscal attestation template, add signature and date fields, and sign documents electronically before sending them to donors.

template.p: Petition tracks signatures and signatory info, and monitor progress per petition.

ol.li: Create a new petition in the Petition app and customize the petition page and form using the Website Editor.

li.p: Publish petition forms online and share via email or social media.
Each submitted form creates a new signature record in the Petition app.
Track signature progress and analyze data per petition in real time.
Keep signatories informed about petition results by sending follow-up emails.

div.p: Add a checkbox on the petition form to let signatories opt-in to receive updates about future actions, events, and news from the NGO, then add those contacts to your mailing list for future updates and events.

template.p: Events helps organize actions like public talks, fundraisers, volunteer days, or annual meetings to engage supporters and organize participation efficiently.

ol.li: Create events for public or private audiences, such as a General Assembly for members or a Human Rights talk & dinner.

li.p: Set entry slots, ticket types, and attendance limits if needed.
Choose the event visibility by making it public or accessible only via a shared link.
Customize the event page on your website to include all the information you want to share.
Share event links via email or social media for easy sign-up.

template.p: Website & eCommerce promotes your NGO online by sharing your mission and actions, selling memberships, merchandise, collecting donations, and managing petitions forms for signatures.

ol.li: Share the mission and impact clearly on the website. Explain the NGO‚Äôs goals, ongoing projects, and how visitors can get involved or support.

li.p: Sell branded merchandise, fundraising products, and memberships online with eCommerce.
Create products like a ‚ÄúSolidarity Candle,‚Äù set prices, add images, and activate online sales.
Configure payment providers and methods.
Create a donation form using the ‚ÄúDonation‚Äù block in the website editor, and embed petition forms directly on the website.
Promote events with dedicated event pages and online ticket sales.

div.p: Set up pricelists to offer special prices when resellers buy in bulk. This helps manage discounts automatically for larger orders.

ul.li: Go to Sales > Configuration > Pricelists .
Create a new pricelist (e.g., ‚ÄúReseller Bulk Pricing‚Äù).
Add discount rules based on minimum quantities.
Assign the pricelist to reseller contacts.
Discounts apply automatically on sales orders.

template.h3: Manage Campaigns with Project and Tasks
template.p: Campaigns help organize fundraising or awareness efforts by breaking them into manageable tasks.

li.p: Create a new Project for the campaign in the Project app.
Add Tasks to the project, such as ‚ÄúDesign flyers,‚Äù ‚ÄúContact sponsors,‚Äù or ‚ÄúOrganize event logistics.‚Äù
Assign tasks to team members or volunteers, setting deadlines and priorities.
Track progress by updating task statuses and using the project overview.
Use built-in communication tools to discuss tasks and share files within the project.

template.p: CRM and Contacts manages contact relationships and interactions for donors, members, and partners.

li.p: Store and organize all contacts in Contacts.
Track interactions, plan activities, and log communications in the CRM app.
Use tags and filters in Contacts to segment contacts for targeted campaigns or follow-ups.

template.p: Use Email Marketing to send newsletters, donation calls, event promotion, and keep supporters and members informed.

ol.li: Create a new mailing in the Email Marketing app.
Select recipients using customized or favorites filters like Donors, Members, or Volunteers.
Design your message with the drag-and-drop editor.
Personalize content using dynamic fields (e.g. name).
Send or schedule and track opens and clicks.

div.div: How to create Contact Segments for Email Campaigns?

ol.li: Create a new Mailing under the Email Marketing app.
Use the filter feature to find contacts based on specific tags.
Choose a tag like Donors, Volunteers, Partners, or Signatories.
Save this filter as a Favorite to easily reuse it in future campaigns.

template.p: Planning schedules and manages volunteer shifts and assignments effectively.

li.p: Define volunteer roles like ‚ÄúOutreach Coordinator‚Äù or ‚ÄúEvent Assistant‚Äù in the Employee form, under the Settings tab.
Use the Planning app to schedule shifts automatically based on availability and roles.
Volunteers can check upcoming assignments via their portal or through email notifications.

template.p: Use Calendar to schedule internal meetings, volunteer briefings, fieldwork missions, or training sessions.

li.p: Open the Calendar app to create appointments, team check-ins, or planning sessions.
Click on a time slot to schedule an event and invite team members.
View team availability by toggling on their calendars to avoid conflicts.

div.p: How to sync Odoo Calendar with External Calendar like Google or Outlook calendar?

ul.li: Go to Settings ‚Üí Calendar ‚Üí Sync External Calendar.
Connect each user‚Äôs Google or Outlook calendar.

li.p: Events created outside of Odoo will automatically appear in the Odoo calendar.

template.p: Expenses tracks reimbursements and operational costs for campaigns, events, or fieldwork.

li.p: Team members submit expenses with receipts for approval.
Review and confirm expenses in the Expense app for tracking and accounting.

template.p: Sales and Invoicing handle partner contributions, large donations, and eCommerce orders.

li.p: Create sales orders for specific donations, bulk merchandise purchases or partnership packages in Sales.
Confirm orders to generate invoices automatically in Invoicing.
Track payment status and send reminders as needed.

template.p: 1. Launch the Campaign: Create a Project called Stop Child Labor and add key tasks like ‚ÄúCreate awareness materials‚Äù and ‚ÄúReach out to schools and local authorities‚Äù.
2. Publish Donation & Petition Forms: Use the Website to embed a donation form and a petition urging policy changes.
3. Organize Awareness Events: Schedule events like Community Talks or Film Screenings using Events.
4. Involve Volunteers: Create volunteer roles in Employees and assign shifts using Planning.
5. Sell Campaign Merchandise: Offer items like a ‚ÄúStop Child Labor‚Äù badge via eCommerce, and manage orders and payments online.
6. Track Costs: Log campaign-related expenses in Expenses, linked to the project.
7. Send Attestations: Generate and sign donation attestations using Donations and Sign, then send to supporters and authorities at the end of the year.
8. Keep Supporters Engaged: Use Email Marketing to send updates and thank-you messages to donors and petition signers.
